recipe.name: Candied Barberries
recipe.instructions: 1. Soak the barberry fruit in water for 15 minutes 2. Fish the barberry fruit from the top of the water into a colander, checking carefully for thorns or small stones 3. Wash the barberry in the colander, still checking for impurities 4. Put two tablespoons of sugar into a small pan 5. Add some boiling water to the pan 6. Swish the water around in the pan to dissolve the sugar 7. Add the barberry fruit to the pan and let it simmer for a couple of minutes (uncovered) 8. Add some saffron butter to the pan, then stir to mix it in
